scenes.description: 화성 시뮬레이션 돔 내부, 붉은 사막

gemini.visualDetails: Mars simulation dome interior, vast red-orange Martian terrain with rocky surface, transparent dome walls showing dark sky above, 10 teams in spacesuits scattered across the dome, emergency supply crates visible
gemini.lighting: Harsh artificial lighting mixed with reddish ambient glow from the simulated Martian sky

gemini.visualDetails: Inside a Mars habitat module, red warning lights flashing, visible vapor/gas stream escaping from a crack in the wall, two men (young Asian physicist and muscular military man) examining the wall with instruments, digital pressure gauge showing dropping numbers
gemini.lighting: Red emergency lighting with strobing alarm lights

scenes.description: 화성 토양에서 물 추출, 로봇 하나

gemini.visualDetails: Inside Mars habitat, a small robot (Robot Hana) heating Martian soil, steam rising as water vapor condenses on a collection surface, young Asian female hacker monitoring a laptop showing hacked robot diagnostics, older man with kind face overseeing the robot
gemini.lighting: Warm interior lighting, steam catching the light

gemini.visualDetails: Mars habitat at night, frost forming on interior walls, team of 7 huddled together for warmth in sleeping area, dim emergency lights, one young woman (former idol) humming quietly while others try to sleep, stars visible through frost-covered dome panel
gemini.lighting: Very dim blue-cold lighting, minimal warmth, breath visible as vapor

gemini.visualDetails: Elderly Asian man (67, thin, kind face) collapsed on Martian terrain inside dome, young female med student kneeling beside him checking vitals, small robot nearby expanding its shell to create a pressure chamber, other team members rushing over with concern
gemini.lighting: Harsh overhead light on the fallen man, shadows around

gemini.visualDetails: Large digital display board inside Mars dome showing team status - Team 2: 2 eliminated, Team 5: 1 eliminated, Team 8: 3 eliminated, Team 7: 0 eliminated (highlighted in green). Seven team members standing together looking at the board, mixed emotions of relief and guilt
gemini.lighting: Cool digital screen light illuminating faces

scenes.description: 린이 기밀 데이터 발견, 컴퓨터 화면

gemini.visualDetails: Young Asian woman (22, short hair, sharp eyes) hunched over a glowing laptop screen in a dark corner of the habitat, screen showing classified text: [TEAM 7 - SPECIAL PROTOCOL], Difficulty: +40%, green terminal text reflecting on her face, USB drive in hand
gemini.lighting: Screen glow only, very dark surroundings, green text reflection on face

gemini.visualDetails: Mars dust storm engulfing the simulation dome, 100km/h winds, swirling red-orange dust particles reducing visibility to near zero, dome walls flexing under pressure, team members bracing walls from inside, small robot supporting a structural beam
gemini.lighting: Diffused reddish-brown from dust, flickering interior lights

scenes.description: 김태호와 이지안 대화, 별이 보이는 밤

gemini.visualDetails: After the storm, inside quiet habitat. Elderly Asian man and young female med student sitting side by side looking through a cleared dome panel at stars. Both look tired but peaceful. Subtle sadness in their expressions. They share the knowledge of their own mortality
gemini.lighting: Soft starlight through dome, gentle warm interior ambient

gemini.visualDetails: Dark corridor of the Mars dome facility, bright light coming from an opening door at the end, a silhouette of a man standing in the doorway. In the foreground, a young Asian physicist (28) staring in shock, mouth slightly open. The silhouette suggests someone important, authoritative
gemini.lighting: Strong backlight from door creating dramatic silhouette, dark foreground
